name: ERA (itch) (JC Fuggy)
description:
ERA

After bonding with a mysterious power you’ve been taken to a secret test facility and prodded by scientists. Use the newfound power to escape at all cost, even if it means obliterating the entire facility...

FEATURES:
  • Max Payne 3 inspired combat gameplay
  • Five unique levels
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 1.64 GB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard or Xbox controller
CONTROLS: Keyboard: Xbox: WASDLeft StickMoveSpaceRBBullet Time DodgeShiftRight Stick ButtonBullet TimeRMBLTAimLMBRTShoot1 LBHandgun2 LBShotgunTABD-Pad UpHeal

(This game is a student project made in 15 weeks, created by 17 students at The Game Assembly. Credits is shown in the game. No further development will be made.)
